kpi.name: M1006C211

kpi_info.title: RB SETUP FAIL FOR DC-HSDPA DUE TO NO REPLY
kpi_info.use: The number of failed Radio Bearer setups/reconfigurations for DC-HSDPA due to UE not responding. Also M1006C192 is updated along with this counter if the radio bearer was not using HSDPA previously. UPDATED: When the UE does not respond to the RRC: RADIO BEARER SETUP, RRC: RADIO BEARER RECONFIGURATION, RRC: PHYSICAL CHANNEL RECONFIGURATION or RRC: TRANSPORT CHANNEL RECONFIGURATION message sent by the RNC for DC-HSDPA establishment and a timer expires in the RNC.

kpi.kpi_alias: RB SETUP FAIL FOR DC-HSDPA DUE TO NO REPLY
